    "formula": [
        "G.f. F(x) is algebraic with minimal polynomial x^4*F(x)^4 - 2x^3*(x - 1)*F(x)^3 + x*(x^3 - 2x^2 + 4x - 1)*F(x)^2 - (2x^2 - 2x + 1)*F(x) + 1.",
